alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Monmouth; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 6:33PM EDT until July 29 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HUNTERDON...MERCER...SOUTHERN SOMERSET...WEST CENTRAL MONMOUTH...SOUTHWESTERN MIDDLESEX AND CENTRAL BUCKS COUNTIES... At 633 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hopewell, or 12 miles north of Trenton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, New Brunswick, Somerset, East Brunswick, South Brunswick, North Brunswick, Ewing, Princeton, Byram, Bedminster, Jamesburg, Hightstown, Flemington, Tinicum, Cranbury, Pennington, New Hope, Dublin, Hopewell and Frenchtown. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 8A and 9. Interstate 195 in New Jersey near mile marker 11. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 64 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
